input.sentences: mom and daughter went to an early movie then arrived for dinner .
their hosts were a lovely couple .
they had all seen the movie though some did n't like as much as others .
the daughter finished up the last of the wine and they called a cab .
output.sentences: There was a movie premiere for my best friend's mom, and we celebrated with nice dinner.
My best friend and her boyfriend were lovely and great hosts, they also make a cute couple.
At the premiere there was plenty of drinks, and I got a bit tipsy at dinner.
While we were sitting, the movie was playing behind us.
We had great food and great wine, and when we finished, my best friend's younger sister, her mom's other daughter, stood up made a toast, and chugged her drink!
